body:
Files: src/wasm/wasm-import-wrapper-cache.{h,cc}
- class wasm::WasmImportWrapperCache
  - struct CacheKey { ImportCallKind kind; CanonicalTypeIndex type_index; int expected_arity; Suspend suspend; bool operator==; Hash }
  - LazyInitialize(Isolate* triggering_isolate): reserves code space for wrappers and initializes WasmCodeAllocator
  - ModificationScope helper (RAII lock) with operator[](key) and AddWrapper(key, WasmCompilationResult result, WasmCode::Kind kind) -> installs code and reloc info into wrapper code space, sets up WasmCode object, tracks in entry_map_ and codes_ map, handles refcount init
  - CompileWasmImportCallWrapper(Isolate*, ImportCallKind, const CanonicalSig*, CanonicalTypeIndex sig_index, bool source_positions, int expected_arity, Suspend): invokes compiler::CompileWasmImportCallWrapper and AddWrapper under lock, logs and counters, returns WasmCode*
  - MaybeGet(kind, type_index, expected_arity, suspend): thread-safe lookup, AddRef and return WasmCode* or nullptr
  - FindWrapper(WasmCodePointer call_target): reverse-lookup by CPT entrypoint
  - Lookup(Address pc): lookup by instruction address (disassembler)
  - Free(std::vector<WasmCode*>& wrappers): frees code, clears maps
  - LogForIsolate, EstimateCurrentMemoryConsumption
- Integrations:
  - wasm/wasm-objects.cc installs wrappers into WasmDispatchTable entries and uses MaybeGet/Compile paths; also calls FindWrapper on WasmJSFunctionData.
  - compiler/wasm-compiler.cc provides CompileWasmImportCallWrapper implementation using Turboshaft pipeline.
explanation: Indexes the import wrapper cache including key structure and compile/install paths, and the reverse lookup helper. This is central to managing wasm-to-js wrapper code objects and their code pointer table entries.
file_line: wasm/wasm-import-wrapper-cache.h: CacheKey; .cc: LazyInitialize, AddWrapper, CompileWasmImportCallWrapper, MaybeGet, FindWrapper, Lookup
